extends android.support.v4.app.FragmentStatePagerAdapter

        public SlidePagerAdapter(android.support.v4.app.FragmentManager fragmentManager,
                 int category,

        Constructor. Depending the kind of category, the first element of the list will be different.
        Parameters:
        fragmentManager - Fragment manager.
        category - Determine the kind of the slider (men or women)
        categories - ArrayList with Category objects.
